thread.title: ISIS members in western Mosul have been placed on high alert after | World | News | Express.co.uk
thread.title_full: ISIS members in western Mosul have been placed on high alert after | World | News | Express.co.uk

author: Thomas Hunt
title: ISIS members in western Mosul have been placed on high alert after | World | News | Express.co.uk
text:
Yesterday a civilian stabbed a militant after refusing to pay a false tax and reports agree ISIS are looking over their shoulders as locals become emboldened by the success of government forces. 
Late in January, Iraqi joint government forces recaptured the whole of eastern Mosul after furious fighting with IS militants. GETTY The Iraqi army have been leaving bodies on the side of the road as a warning to ISIS 
Coalition airstrikes have bombarded the Western side of Mosul over the past two weeks in preparation for a ground invasion by Iraqi forces. 
Iraqi Prime Minsister Haider al-Abadi said: “ISIS have lost at least 3300 members in the battle for Mosul alongside many extremist commanders.” GETTY The Iraqi army have taken Eastern Mosul and a heroic terrorist killer is on the loose 
United Nations Secretary-General, Antonio Guterres added: “ISIL is militarily on the defensive in several regions, notably in Afghanistan, Iraq, Libya and the Syrian Arab Republic.” 
The Iraqi army have left the rotting corpses of ISIS militants to be ‘eaten by dogs’ as a reminder that the caliphate is failing. What's left of Mosul's University Tue, January 31, 2017
